text: Roman Ablakimov (born 28 August 1987) is a Kyrgyzstani footballer who is a Midfielder for Sunkar and the Kyrgyzstan national football team. ==International Career Stats== ===Goals for Senior National Team=== {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !!
